title: Rising foreign D for USD, appreciation, falling Xn

content.question: If higher United States interest rates cause foreign demand for the dollar to increase, which of the following will occur to the international value of the dollar and to United States exports?

choices.label: International Value of the Dollar Exports Increase Increase
International Value of the Dollar Exports Increase Decrease
International Value of the Dollar Exports Increase No change
International Value of the Dollar Exports Decrease Increase
International Value of the Dollar Exports Decrease Decrease

content.answer: International Value of the Dollar Exports Increase Decrease

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

topic.text: 6.5: Changes in the Foreign Exchange Market and Net Exports

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine the effect(s) of one or more changes on other economic markets.
